Player History
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Don Drysdale (DET)...
Injured on 4/5/1970 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Cleveland on 4/28/1970 (Going to NYY: P D. Gullett, P G. Ross. Going to CLE: CF W. Crawford, SS R. Mendez, P M. Lachemann)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1970, off Jim Lehew (BAL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1976, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 5/7/1979...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/24/1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1979, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 15 RBI...
